job_details.Functieomschrijving: ## **About the Role** Canvas is one of the core pillars under Michelangelo, Uber's machine learning platform. This team focuses on building and standardizing model dev experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists. We build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas, where ML engineers can develop the model solutions for their business needs in all critical ML phases, such as feature engineering, training, serving, ML-Ops, and monitoring. With the Canvas tool, users can iterate quickly and collaboratively during model dev time to build their ML solution, and the solution will be automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production. Now we are extending our modeling support to generative AI and large scale models. We are looking for talents with experience building and productionize large scaling models solving business problems. This team is formed by a group of talents with various expertise, such as modeling techniques, batch data processing optimization
job_details.full_text:
Sr Software Engineer (Machine Learning)

## **About the Role** Canvas is one of the core pillars under Michelangelo, Uber's machine learning platform. This team focuses on building and standardizing model dev experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists. We build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas, where ML engineers can develop the model solutions for their business needs in all critical ML phases, such as feature engineering, training, serving, ML-Ops, and monitoring. With the Canvas tool, users can iterate quickly and collaboratively during model dev time to build their ML solution, and the solution will be automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production. Now we are extending our modeling support to generative AI and large scale models. We are looking for talents with experience building and productionize large scaling models solving business problems. This team is formed by a group of talents with various expertise, such as modeling techniques, batch data processing optimization

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and standardizing model development experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists, focusing on the entire ML lifecycle from feature engineering, training, serving, ML-Ops, and monitoring. While it mentions extending support to generative AI, the core focus remains on traditional ML model development, productionization, and the MLOps aspects of a platform like Canvas. The emphasis on 'model dev experiences', 'iterating quickly and collaboratively during model dev time', and 'automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production' aligns strongly with the 'ML Engineer' profile, particularly the 'Operations Engineering (MLOps)' and 'Modeling' aspects. The mention of generative AI appears to be an extension of existing ML capabilities rather than the primary focus.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'feature engineering' is a core component of data preparation and transformation for machine learning models.
The job explicitly mentions 'model dev experiences', 'develop the model solutions', 'training', and 'modeling techniques', indicating a focus on creating and refining machine learning models.
The mention of 'training' is a fundamental aspect of the model development process.
The phrase 'modeling techniques' directly refers to the methods and algorithms used in machine learning.
The job description states an extension to 'generative AI and large scale models', which falls under the umbrella of modeling.
job_tasks.phrase: generative AI and large scale models

job_tasks.justification: The role involves building and operating a 'dev tool known as Canvas' and standardizing 'model dev experiences', which implies software development to create and maintain these tools and platforms.
job_tasks.phrase: building and standardizing model dev experiences

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas' indicates the development of software tools.
job_tasks.phrase: build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas

job_tasks.justification: The ability to 'iterate quickly and collaboratively' during model development time and have solutions 'automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production' suggests software engineering practices for application development and deployment.
job_tasks.phrase: iterate quickly and collaboratively during model dev time

job_tasks.justification: The job explicitly mentions 'ML-Ops' as a critical ML phase supported by the Canvas tool.
The phrase 'serving' in the context of ML models refers to deploying them for inference, which is a key MLOps activity.
The mention of 'monitoring' in the context of ML models is a crucial part of MLOps for tracking performance and health.
The phrase 'productionize large scaling models' directly relates to deploying and managing models in a production environment, a core MLOps responsibility.
The phrase 'automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production' describes automated deployment and scaling, which are key MLOps practices.
job_tasks.phrase: automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'batch data processing optimization' is a specific task within data engineering focused on efficient handling of large datasets.
